titleStmt.title: The Passionate louer to the tune of I lou'd thee once Ile loue no more.

notesStmt.note: Right half of sheet contains: The Second Part. To the same Tune.
Imperfect: cropped, with partial loss of imprint, which may read "London, Printed for F. Coles"; divided in two parts.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
